Dr Goodwin,
I tried installing Cantera-1.5.3-src.zip from following the 
instructions you gave from 'Cantera153-build-win32' and i was the 
configure command worked fine.  When i went to build the project in 
Microsoft Visual Studio under the build all command i got the 
following errors:

xml.cpp
C:\cantera-1.5.3\Cantera\src\ct_defs.h(21) : fatal error C1083: 
Cannot open include file: 'config.h': No such file or directory
Error executing cl.exe.

all - 37 error(s), 0 warning(s)

There was the same error for 32 different .cpp files and they all 
said that the config.h file could not be found.  Any help on this 
problem would be greatly appriciated

Thank You,
Sean Henderson
